timeline.message: make nacosStartingListener is decoupling with springApplicationRunListener.
refactor. transfer nacos listeners to SpringApplicationRunListener.

timeline.bodyText: 将来可以考虑这里面不要依赖Spring的对象信息
timeline.author: chuntaojun
timeline.diffHunk:

replies.bodyText: 恩。现在还是依赖的spring, 需要用里面的environment, 以后如果要剔除spring时，再进行重构。
replies.author: horizonzy
